title: Selle Repente Quasar CR gets carbon rails for 130g on- and off-road saddle
content:
Italian saddle manufacturers, Selle Repente, have release a new carbon rail version of the Quasar on- and off-road saddle. Swapping out steel rails for carbon drops weigh to a claimed 130g, around 40g lighter than the original, maintaining the 260mm x 142mm dimensions and flat-top design. Selle Repente Quasar CR The Selle Repente Quasar CR

The post Selle Repente Quasar CR gets carbon rails for 130g on- and off-road saddle appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
